programme.title: Palm Swings
programme.desc: Premiere. After moving to Palm Springs, a young married couple puts their love to the test when they discover that their neighbours are swingers. Comedy drama, starring Sugar Lyn Beard, Tia Carrere and Diane Farr.

programme.title: Sheikh Jackson
programme.desc: Premiere. An Islamic cleric who likes to dress as Michael Jackson suffers a crisis of faith after hearing that his childhood idol has died. Drama, starring Basma, Hazem Ehab and Maged El Kedwany. In Arabic.

programme.title: The Great Wall: Special
programme.desc: A look at the epic action adventure starring Matt Damon, Pedro Pascal and Willem Dafoe.

programme.title: Gifted
programme.desc: Premiere. Single man Frank Adler attempts to raise his child prodigy niece, Mary. However, his plans for a normal school life for the youngster are foiled when the youngster's mathematical abilities come to the attention of Frank's formidable mother, Evelyn. Drama, starring Chris Evans, Lindsay Duncan and Mckenna Grace.

programme.title: American Wrestler: The Wizard
programme.desc: Premiere. In 1980, a teenager escapes the unrest in Iran only to face more hostility in America, due to the hostage crisis. Determined to fit in, he joins the school's troubled wrestling team. Drama, starring George Kosturos, William Fichtner and Ali Afshar.

programme.title: Captain Underpants: The First Epic Movie
programme.desc: A pair of elementary school pranksters inadvertently transform their mean-spirited principal into a daring vigilante. Cartoon adventure, with the voices of Kevin Hart, Thomas Middleditch and Ed Helms.

programme.title: Girls Trip
programme.desc: Premiere. When four lifelong friends travel to New Orleans for an annual festival, sisterhoods are rekindled and wild sides are rediscovered. Comedy, starring Regina Hall, Queen Latifah, Tiffany Haddish and Jada Pinkett Smith.

programme.title: Rough Night
programme.desc: Premiere. Things go terribly wrong for a group of girlfriends who hire a male stripper for a hen party in Miami. Comedy, starring Scarlett Johansson, Kate McKinnon and Zoe Kravitz.

programme.title: The Dark Tower
programme.desc: Premiere. A young lad is transported to a parallel universe where he is caught in a battle between a mysterious gunslinger and a sinister sorcerer. Fantasy adventure based on the Stephen King novels, starring Idris Elba, Matthew McConaughey and Tom Taylor.

programme.desc: A businessman heads to a music festival in a bid to retrieve his stolen phone and wallet, but instead finds a new world of possibilities. Romantic comedy drama, starring Alexander Perkins, Edyta Budnik and Zara Day.(n)

programme.desc: A former boxer is blackmailed into performing a prison hit by a ruthless drug kingpin. Crime thriller, starring Vince Vaughn, Jennifer Carpenter and Don Johnson.(n)

programme.title: William Shakespeare's Romeo + Juliet
programme.desc: A city is divided by the conflict between two feuding families - the fathers are bitter business rivals, and the younger generation are continually fighting in the streets. The son of one household falls in love at first sight with his enemy's daughter - but the vendetta threatens their secret romance. Baz Luhrmann's modern update of Shakespeare's tragic love story, with Leonardo DiCaprio, Claire Danes, Pete Postlethwaite and Miriam Margolyes.

programme.title: Interlude In Prague
programme.desc: A young Mozart embarks on a forbidden affair with a beautiful singer while visiting the Czech capital. Period drama, starring Aneurin Barnard, James Purefoy and Samantha Barks.

programme.title: Heaven Knows, Mr Allison
programme.desc: A US marine corporal stationed on a South Pacific island and a novice nun on a mission are forced into the hills when Japanese forces arrive and set up military bases during the Second World War. Before long the pair develop strong emotional ties, but in resisting their feelings for each other the relationship becomes one of deep mutual respect. Romantic drama, written and directed by John Huston, with Robert Mitchum and Deborah Kerr.

programme.title: The Top Ten Show
programme.desc: Which movies are doing the best business at home and across the pond? Clips from the UK and US Top Ten show you the best of what's on offer on the big screen.

programme.title: Heartbeats
programme.desc: A feisty US hip-hop fanatic travels to India for a wedding, and falls in love with a new style of dance and the man who introduces it to her. Comedy, starring Daphne Zuniga, Justin Chon and Krystal Ellsworth.

programme.title: Save the Last Dance
programme.desc: A troubled teenager moves to a tough inner-city school after her mother's death, but struggles to settle into her vastly different life - until a new boyfriend helps her discover a fresh sense of purpose through the power of dance. Romantic drama, starring Julia Stiles, Sean Patrick Thomas and Kerry Washington.

programme.title: Moulin Rouge
programme.desc: An idealistic writer is drawn to the decadent backstreets of Paris, determined to play a part in the bohemian revolution. He falls for a courtesan from the famous Moulin Rouge, but a scheming duke also covets her affections, setting the scene for tragedy. Baz Luhrmann's romantic musical, with Ewan McGregor, Nicole Kidman, Jim Broadbent, Richard Roxburgh and John Leguizamo. Featuring reworkings of pop songs by Nirvana, David Bowie, Elton John and others.

programme.title: Footloose
programme.desc: A rebellious, hip-swinging student from the city moves to a small religious community, where he instantly clashes with an old-school fire-and-brimstone preacher - who has banned dancing and rock 'n' roll because he considers them immoral. Drama, starring Kevin Bacon, Lori Singer, John Lithgow, Chris Penn, Dianne Wiest and Sarah Jessica Parker.

programme.title: Footloose
programme.desc: A teenager from Boston moves to a small conservative town, and discovers the council and a preacher have enforced a ban on loud music and dancing. He openly defies the harsh rules, revitalising the local youth and winning the heart of the reverend's daughter. Musical remake, with Kenny Wormald, Julianne Hough and Dennis Quaid.

programme.title: Flashdance
programme.desc: A determined factory welder leads a double life as an exotic dancer by night. Her real ambition is to become a ballet star, and with the support of her boss and an instructor, she sets out to realise her dreams. Drama, with Jennifer Beals, Michael Nouri, Lilia Skala, Sunny Johnson, Kyle T Heffner and Lee Ving.

programme.title: Honey 3: Dare to Dance
programme.desc: A hip-hop inspired performance of Romeo and Juliet in Cape Town is threatened by tensions among the cast. Dance drama sequel, starring Cassie Ventura, Kenny Wormald and Dena Kaplan.

programme.title: Footloose
programme.desc: A rebellious, hip-swinging student from the city moves to a small religious community, where he instantly clashes with an old-school fire-and-brimstone preacher - who has banned dancing and rock 'n' roll because he considers them immoral. Drama, starring Kevin Bacon, Lori Singer, John Lithgow, Chris Penn, Dianne Wiest and Sarah Jessica Parker.

programme.title: Saturday Night Fever
programme.desc: A streetwise Brooklyn teenager struggles to cope with a dead-end job and a dysfunctional family, but finds an escape in the disco scene, where he falls in love with a girl dreaming of breaking free from her equally poor background to pursue a brighter future in Manhattan. Drama, starring John Travolta, Karen Lynn Gorney and Paul Pape, and featuring songs by the Bee Gees.

programme.title: Moulin Rouge
programme.desc: An idealistic writer is drawn to the decadent backstreets of Paris, determined to play a part in the bohemian revolution. He falls for a courtesan from the famous Moulin Rouge, but a scheming duke also covets her affections, setting the scene for tragedy. Baz Luhrmann's romantic musical, with Ewan McGregor, Nicole Kidman, Jim Broadbent, Richard Roxburgh and John Leguizamo. Featuring reworkings of pop songs by Nirvana, David Bowie, Elton John and others.

programme.title: Flashdance
programme.desc: A determined factory welder leads a double life as an exotic dancer by night. Her real ambition is to become a ballet star, and with the support of her boss and an instructor, she sets out to realise her dreams. Drama, with Jennifer Beals, Michael Nouri, Lilia Skala, Sunny Johnson, Kyle T Heffner and Lee Ving.

programme.title: Sabrina
programme.desc: A chauffeur's daughter falls for her father's playboy employer, but when he rejects her she flees to Paris. On her return, however, he is smitten by the alluring woman she has become - even though he is about to be married. To ensure the wedding takes place, his older brother decides to woo the beauty himself. Comedy, starring Audrey Hepburn, William Holden, Humphrey Bogart and Walter Hampden.

programme.title: Meet Joe Black
programme.desc: Death takes over the body of a recently deceased young man, and embarks on a mission to claim the life of a powerful media tycoon, but ends up falling in love with his daughter instead - leaving him on the horns of a dilemma. Remake of 1934 romantic fantasy Death Takes a Holiday, starring Brad Pitt, Anthony Hopkins and Claire Forlani.

programme.title: Aftermath
programme.desc: A hard-working construction worker is forced to deal with life-shattering loss when his family are killed in a plane crash. Drama, starring Arnold Schwarzenegger, Scoot McNairy and Maggie Grace.

programme.title: The Lucky One
programme.desc: A Marine serving in Iraq finds a photograph of a woman belonging to an unknown fellow soldier, and considers it his good luck charm. When he returns to America, he decides to track her down, and after taking a job at her family's boarding kennels, falls in love with her. Romantic drama, with Zac Efron, Taylor Schilling and Blythe Danner.

programme.title: A Street Cat Named Bob
programme.desc: Homeless busker James Bowen has a life-changing moment when a tabby cat walks into his life. Comedy-drama based on the best selling novel, starring Luke Treadaway, Ruta Gedmintas and Anthony Head.

programme.title: Dreamgirls
programme.desc: A 1960s singing trio are chosen to perform backing vocals for a popular performer - an event that launches the band on a successful career of their own. However, when the most attractive of the girls is picked as the face of the group, edging out the other two, personal rivalries begin to jeopardise their friendship. Musical drama, inspired by the rise to fame of Diana Ross and the Supremes, and starring Jamie Foxx, Beyonce Knowles, Eddie Murphy and an Oscar-winning Jennifer Hudson.

programme.title: Nina
programme.desc: Troubled soul icon Nina Simone rediscovers the meaning of her life and work thanks to the support of loyal friend and assistant Clifton Henderson. Music biopic, starring Zoe Saldana, David Oyelowo and Mike Epps.

programme.title: Born to Be Blue
programme.desc: In the late 1960s, jazz musician Chet Baker battles drug addiction and struggles to launch a comeback. Drama, starring Ethan Hawke, Carmen Ejogo and Callum Keith Rennie.

programme.title: Ray
programme.desc: Biopic of soul singer Ray Charles, exploring his battle against racial bigotry, drug addiction and personal demons on his rise to stardom. Blind by the time he was seven, the musician flirted with several styles including gospel, jazz and country, and became known as one of the music industry's most innovative performers. Starring an Oscar-winning Jamie Foxx alongside Regina King and Kerry Washington.

programme.title: The Lucky One
programme.desc: A Marine serving in Iraq finds a photograph of a woman belonging to an unknown fellow soldier, and considers it his good luck charm. When he returns to America, he decides to track her down, and after taking a job at her family's boarding kennels, falls in love with her. Romantic drama, with Zac Efron, Taylor Schilling and Blythe Danner.

programme.title: Tumbledown
programme.desc: Brash biographer Andrew crosses paths with grieving Hannah when he agrees to write about her famous, folk-singing husband. Romantic comedy, starring Rebecca Hall, Jason Sudeikis and Dianna Agron.(n)

programme.title: Drown
programme.desc: Jealousy and homophobia bubble to the surface when a younger rival threatens the top-dog status of a Sydney lifeguard. Drama, starring Matt Levett, Jack Matthews and Harry Cook.(n)

programme.title: GI Blues
programme.desc: A guitar-strumming soldier bets he can win the hardened heart of an unresponsive West German cabaret dancer. She rejects him when she learns about the wager, but by then he has already genuinely fallen in love with her. Musical, starring Elvis Presley, Juliet Prowse, James Douglas and Robert Ivers. Songs include Blue Suede Shoes, Tonight Is So Right For Love and the title number.(n)

programme.title: The Remains of the Day
programme.desc: A butler in a 1930s aristocratic household has dedicated himself to serving his master, putting duty above all else and repressing his affection for the housekeeper, who also happens to be in love with him. On the outbreak of war, the nobleman's Nazi sympathies come to light, marking a change of heart in the old servant, who looks back with misgivings about the loyalty that may have cost him dearly. Period drama, with Anthony Hopkins, Emma Thompson and James Fox.(n)

programme.title: The Doo Dah Man
programme.desc: A New Jersey college student running away from home finds himself travelling through the back roads of Texas with a con man who's just escaped from prison. Drama, starring Glenn Morshower, Will Brittain and Katherine Willis.(n)

programme.title: My Girl
programme.desc: A lonely 11-year-old tomboy feels responsible for her mother's death, but a boy's friendship helps her get through her emotional problems. Meanwhile, when she realises her father is falling in love with his new employee, she sets out to do all she can to end the romance. Drama, starring Anna Chlumsky, Macaulay Culkin, Dan Aykroyd and Jamie Lee Curtis.(n)

programme.title: Cafe Society
programme.desc: In the 1930s, a Bronx youngster heads to Hollywood and falls for the beautiful secretary of his powerful agent uncle. Woody Allen's romantic comedy, starring Steve Carell, Jesse Eisenberg and Kristen Stewart.(n)

programme.title: A Beautiful Mind
programme.desc: Biopic of the brilliant American mathematician John Nash, whose prospects of a promising career with the CIA were confounded by paranoid delusions and schizophrenia as the stress of the job proved too much of a burden. Oscar-winning drama, starring Russell Crowe, Jennifer Connelly, Ed Harris, Judd Hirsch, Paul Bettany and Christopher Plummer.(n)

programme.title: A United Kingdom
programme.desc: Trouble brews when King Seretse Khama of Botswana falls for Ruth Williams, a London office worker. Fact-based drama from Belle director Amma Assante, starring David Oyelowo and Rosamund Pike.(n)

programme.title: Maudie
programme.desc: An arthritic Nova Scotia woman works as a housekeeper while she hones her skills as an artist. Eventually she becomes a beloved figure in the community. Fact based romantic drama, starring Sally Hawkins, Ethan Hawke and Zachary Bennett.(n)

programme.title: Collateral Beauty
programme.desc: When a New York executive tips into depression, his scheming partners plan to use his letters to Love, Time and Death against him. Fantasy drama, with Will Smith, Edward Norton and Helen Mirren.(n)

programme.title: Fifty Shades Darker: Unmasked Edition
programme.desc: The bookish Anastasia Steele and damaged billionaire playboy Christian Grey continue their sado masochistic relationship, while their safety is threatened by strangers from his past. Extended version of the Fifty Shades of Grey sequel, starring Dakota Johnson, Jamie Dornan and Rita Ora.(n)

programme.title: Deuce Bigalow: Male Gigolo
programme.desc: A lowly fish-tank cleaner working at a gigolo's luxurious house has his eyes opened to a completely new way of life - but an accident with his employer's prized pets puts him into a tricky situation. Desperate to raise a quick buck, he is soon entertaining a series of increasingly sex-crazed women. Comedy, starring Rob Schneider, William Forsythe, Eddie Griffin, Oded Fehr and Gail O'Grady.

programme.title: Kill Me Three Times
programme.desc: A hitman arrives in an Australian surfing town on a mission. However, he soon discovers he is not the only one plotting to kill his intended target, and gets mixed up in his rivals' stories of murder, blackmail and revenge. Comedy thriller, starring Simon Pegg, Alice Braga, Luke Hemsworth and Bryan Brown.

programme.title: Police Academy 6: City Under Siege
programme.desc: The clueless cops return yet again, this time to thwart the machinations of a crime lord behind a wave of raids and robberies in the city. Unfortunately, they are unaware Mr Big is always one step ahead thanks to a police informer. Penultimate entry in the comedy series, starring Bubba Smith, David Graf, Michael Winslow, Matt McCoy and Leslie Easterbrook.

programme.title: Just Married
programme.desc: A newlywed couple are in for a rude awakening when they jet off on their dream honeymoon. They are looking forward to an enjoyable tour of Europe - but a series of chaotic events, plus the intervention of the bride's old flame, leaves them at each other's throats and their marriage in tatters. Romantic comedy, with Brittany Murphy, Ashton Kutcher, Christian Kane and David Moscow.

programme.title: The Naked Gun: From the Files of Police Squad
programme.desc: While investigating the shooting of a colleague, disaster-prone police lieutenant Frank Drebin uncovers a plot to assassinate Queen Elizabeth II during her visit to Los Angeles. However, after he is sacked from the force by the mayor, the cop has to operate beneath the radar to get to the bottom of the conspiracy. Comedy, with Leslie Nielsen, Priscilla Presley and Ricardo Montalban.

programme.title: The Naked Gun 2 1/2: The Smell of Fear
programme.desc: Blundering cop Frank Drebin discovers a secret conspiracy to kidnap a renowned solar energy expert and replace him with an imposter. As he sets out to bring the perpetrators to justice, he is unexpectedly reunited with an old flame. Slapstick comedy sequel, starring Leslie Nielsen, Priscilla Presley, George Kennedy, Richard Griffiths and OJ Simpson.

programme.title: The Naked Gun 33 1/3: The Final Insult
programme.desc: Inept police detective Frank Drebin plans to retire from the force, but is lured back by the opportunity to foil a terrorist plot. Going undercover in prison, he sets out to prevent an evil mastermind from escaping and carrying out his fiendish plan - to bomb the Oscar awards ceremony. Comedy sequel, starring Leslie Nielsen, Priscilla Presley, OJ Simpson, George Kennedy and Fred Ward.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: A lifeguard teams up with a new recruit in order to scupper a criminal scheme. Action comedy based on the TV series, starring Dwayne Johnson, Zac Efron, Alexandra Daddario and Priyanka Chopra.

programme.title: Mike and Dave Need Wedding Dates
programme.desc: Calamity ensues when two party-loving brothers attempt to find respectable dates for their sister's Hawaii wedding. Comedy, starring Zac Efron and Anna Kendrick.

programme.title: Hot Tub Time Machine
programme.desc: A man suffering a midlife crisis tries to recapture his lost youth by going back to his old haunts with two equally unhappy friends and his teenage nephew. They end up being transported back to 1986 and are tempted to give themselves the lives they always wanted - despite warnings that they must not change anything. Sci-fi comedy, starring John Cusack, Clark Duke, Craig Robinson and Rob Corddry.

programme.title: The Back-up Plan
programme.desc: A thirtysomething single woman fears she may never have children and decides to undergo artificial insemination. However, shortly after leaving the clinic, she meets the man of her dreams but must decide how to break the news she may shortly be pregnant. Romantic comedy, starring Jennifer Lopez, Alex O'Loughlin, Michaela Watkins, Eric Christian Olsen and Anthony Anderson.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: A lifeguard teams up with a new recruit in order to scupper a criminal scheme. Action comedy based on the TV series, starring Dwayne Johnson, Zac Efron, Alexandra Daddario and Priyanka Chopra.

programme.title: Mike and Dave Need Wedding Dates
programme.desc: Calamity ensues when two party-loving brothers attempt to find respectable dates for their sister's Hawaii wedding. Comedy, starring Zac Efron and Anna Kendrick.

programme.title: Hot Tub Time Machine
programme.desc: A man suffering a midlife crisis tries to recapture his lost youth by going back to his old haunts with two equally unhappy friends and his teenage nephew. They end up being transported back to 1986 and are tempted to give themselves the lives they always wanted - despite warnings that they must not change anything. Sci-fi comedy, starring John Cusack, Clark Duke, Craig Robinson and Rob Corddry.

programme.title: Don Verdean
programme.desc: A biblical archaeologist strays off the righteous path when he accepts financial backing from an ambitious preacher. Comedy from Napoleon Dynamite director Jared Hess, starring Sam Rockwell and Danny McBride.

programme.title: Attack Of The Lederhosen Zombies
programme.desc: Trapped snowboarders fight for their lives when hordes of the undead terrorise a remote ski resort. Horror-comedy, starring Laurie Calvert, Gabriela Marcinkova and Oscar Dyekjaer Giese.

programme.title: Police Academy 7: Mission to Moscow
programme.desc: Commandant Lassard sends the incompetent cops to Russia to help their counterparts capture an elusive criminal mastermind who uses his genius with computers to pull off a series of daring robberies. Comedy sequel, starring George Gaynes, Michael Winslow, David Graf, Leslie Easterbrook and Christopher Lee.

programme.title: Love Of My Life
programme.desc: A woman diagnosed with a fatal brain tumour accepts her fate without fuss, but then her first husband pitches up vowing to win her back. Romantic comedy, starring Anna Chancellor, John Hannah and Hermione Norris.

programme.title: How to Lose Friends & Alienate People
programme.desc: A self-promoting writer is offered a position on the staff of a New York fashion magazine thanks to his irreverent views on the world of celebrity. However, he soon discovers his opinions render him incapable of relating to the superficial personalities he is expected to work with, not to mention his egotistical boss. Comedy based on Toby Young's memoirs, starring Simon Pegg, Kirsten Dunst, Jeff Bridges, Megan Fox and Gillian Anderson.

programme.title: Made of Honor
programme.desc: A single man realises he is in love with his best friend, but has never done anything about it out of a fear of commitment. Everything changes when she returns from a business trip to Scotland with a new fiance in tow, leaving him determined to make sure the wedding does not go ahead. Romantic comedy, starring Patrick Dempsey, Michelle Monaghan and Kevin McKidd.

programme.title: Going in Style
programme.desc: When their pension pots disappear overnight, a trio of cash-strapped retirees decide to rob a Brooklyn bank. Heist caper, starring Morgan Freeman, Michael Caine and Alan Arkin.

programme.title: Bridget Jones's Baby
programme.desc: After a pair of one-night stands, the now single Bridget Jones winds up pregnant. Is the dad old flame Mark Darcy or US dating guru Jack Qwant? Comedy sequel, starring Renee Zellweger, Colin Firth and Patrick Dempsey.

programme.title: Love Actually
programme.desc: Ten interlinked stories of people searching for and finding love. While the newly elected, bachelor British prime minister is smitten by a junior staff member at 10 Downing Street, a heartbroken writer heads for France to get over a failed relationship, and a faded rock star aims to reinvent himself in time for Christmas. Richard Curtis's romantic comedy, with Hugh Grant, Martine McCutcheon, Emma Thompson, Alan Rickman, Colin Firth, Bill Nighy and Liam Neeson.

programme.title: Made of Honor
programme.desc: A single man realises he is in love with his best friend, but has never done anything about it out of a fear of commitment. Everything changes when she returns from a business trip to Scotland with a new fiance in tow, leaving him determined to make sure the wedding does not go ahead. Romantic comedy, starring Patrick Dempsey, Michelle Monaghan and Kevin McKidd.

programme.title: Going in Style
programme.desc: When their pension pots disappear overnight, a trio of cash-strapped retirees decide to rob a Brooklyn bank. Heist caper, starring Morgan Freeman, Michael Caine and Alan Arkin.

programme.title: Bridget Jones's Baby
programme.desc: After a pair of one-night stands, the now single Bridget Jones winds up pregnant. Is the dad old flame Mark Darcy or US dating guru Jack Qwant? Comedy sequel, starring Renee Zellweger, Colin Firth and Patrick Dempsey.

programme.title: Sausage Party
programme.desc: When he hears life after the supermarket isn't much fun for groceries, Frank the sausage investigates. Animated comedy, featuring the voices of Seth Rogen and Kristen Wiig.

programme.title: Barbershop: A Fresh Cut
programme.desc: As their surrounding community has taken a turn for the worse, the crew at Calvin's Barbershop come together to bring some much-needed change to their neighbourhood. Comedy, starring Ice Cube, Cedric the Entertainer and Regina Hall.(n)

programme.title: Dude, Where's My Car
programme.desc: Two friends wake up with the realisation they have absolutely no memory of the events of the night before. They set about retracing their steps - only to stumble across a host of crazy characters, a flock of marauding ostriches and a fanatical alien-worshipping cult. Teen comedy, with Seann William Scott, Ashton Kutcher, Jennifer Garner and Kristy Swanson.(n)

programme.title: Licence to Drive
programme.desc: A teenager promises the girl of his dreams he will take her out in his grandfather's treasured vintage car, even though he has just failed his driving test - leading to a whole host of mishaps and scrapes. Comedy, starring Corey Haim, Corey Feldman, Carol Kane and Heather Graham.(n)

programme.title: It Had to Be You
programme.desc: A commitment-shy jingle writer runs for the hills when her boyfriend proposes. Romantic comedy, starring Cristin Milioti, Dan Soder and Halley Feiffer.(n)

programme.title: Patch Adams
programme.desc: A talented student doctor turns the medical community upside down with his offbeat views about the healing power of laughter. His methods provoke outrage and intense debate among his professors - but his extrovert nature brightens the lives of all kinds of patients. Comedy drama, starring Robin Williams, Monica Potter, Daniel London, Bob Gunton and Philip Seymour Hoffman.(n)

programme.title: As Good as It Gets
programme.desc: A bigoted misanthropic writer, who treats everyone he meets with contempt, is forced to look after a gay neighbour's dog, and develops an empathy with another creature for the first time in years. Sensing a need for human company, he pursues an unlikely romance with a waitress, who is the only person willing to put up with his rudeness. Romantic comedy drama, with Jack Nicholson, Helen Hunt, Cuba Gooding Jr and Greg Kinnear.(n)

programme.title: Rough Night
programme.desc: Premiere. Things go terribly wrong for a group of girlfriends who hire a male stripper for a hen party in Miami. Comedy, starring Scarlett Johansson, Kate McKinnon and Zoe Kravitz.(n)

programme.title: Why Him
programme.desc: A protective dad is far from thrilled when his daughter begins dating a foul-mouthed playboy millionaire. Comedy, starring Bryan Cranston, James Franco and Zoey Deutch.(n)

programme.title: The Boss
programme.desc: Disgraced entrepreneur Michelle Darnell attempts to launch a comeback with the reluctant help of Claire Rawlings, her former PA. Comedy, starring Melissa McCarthy, Kristen Bell and Peter Dinklage.(n)

programme.title: Here Comes the Boom
programme.desc: A biology teacher discovers his school is planning to save money by closing down the music department, leaving his friend out of a job. He puts his college wrestling skills to use and becomes a mixed martial arts fighter, hoping to win enough money to put things right and gain hero status with his students in the process. Comedy, starring Kevin James, Salma Hayek and Henry Winkler.(n)

programme.title: Why Him
programme.desc: A protective dad is far from thrilled when his daughter begins dating a foul-mouthed playboy millionaire. Comedy, starring Bryan Cranston, James Franco and Zoey Deutch.(n)

programme.title: Rough Night
programme.desc: Premiere. Things go terribly wrong for a group of girlfriends who hire a male stripper for a hen party in Miami. Comedy, starring Scarlett Johansson, Kate McKinnon and Zoe Kravitz.(n)

programme.title: Election
programme.desc: A teacher develops an irrational dislike for an overambitious student and plans to sabotage her campaign for school president. He persuades a dim-witted athlete to stand, in the hope he will pip the high-achieving front-runner to the post - but the intervention of another student throws the plan into disarray. Satirical comedy, starring Matthew Broderick, Reese Witherspoon, Chris Klein and Jessica Campbell.(n)

programme.title: Hard Target 2
programme.desc: A mixed martial arts fighter is booked for a match in Myanmar, but becomes the prey in a deadly hunt. Action thriller sequel, starring Scott Adkins, Robert Knepper and Rhona Mitra.

programme.title: The Top Ten Show
programme.desc: Which movies are doing the best business at home and across the pond? Clips from the UK and US Top Ten show you the best of what's on offer on the big screen.

programme.title: Cyborg
programme.desc: A post-apocalyptic warrior risks his life to protect a female android who holds the key to curing a man-made plague devastating humanity. However, a host of bloodthirsty warriors are determined to stop them getting to the scientists who need the information. Sci-fi thriller, starring Jean-Claude Van Damme, Dayle Haddon, Deborah Richter and Vincent Klyn.

programme.title: Stone of Destiny
programme.desc: Four students in 1950s Glasgow hatch a plan to inspire a little national pride by breaking into Westminster Abbey and stealing the Stone of Scone, an important Scottish historical relic that has been held on English soil since the Middle Ages, and returning it to its own country. Fact-based comedy, starring Charlie Cox, Kate Mara, Billy Boyd and Robert Carlyle.

programme.title: The A-Team
programme.desc: Four soldiers are sent on a top-secret mission in Iraq that results in them being imprisoned for a crime they did not commit. When they learn the culprit is trying to sell equipment for producing fake currency, they break out of prison to find both him and evidence of their innocence. Action adventure based on the 1980s TV series, with Liam Neeson, Bradley Cooper, Sharlto Copley and Quinton `Rampage' Jackson.

programme.title: Saving Private Ryan
programme.desc: In the aftermath of the Normandy landings, a group of American soldiers scours the battlefields of France in search of a missing infantryman, who has been given compassionate leave to return home because his brothers have been killed in the conflict. Steven Spielberg's Oscar-winning Second World War drama, starring Tom Hanks, Tom Sizemore, Edward Burns, Matt Damon, Barry Pepper and Vin Diesel.

programme.title: Robin Hood
programme.desc: A Saxon nobleman is declared an outlaw for protecting a poacher from a cruel Norman knight. Hiding out in a forest, he recruits a group of bandits and leads them in a campaign against the corrupt Norman aristocracy, while also fighting to save his friend's niece from being forced into marriage. Adventure, starring Patrick Bergin and Uma Thurman.

programme.title: Alien: Covenant
programme.desc: A crew of colonists sent to populate an alien planet have their mission diverted by a mysterious signal. After landing on a nearby world, they discover what became of the ill-fated Prometheus mission. Ridley Scott's sci-fi thriller, starring Katherine Waterston, Michael Fassbender and Danny McBride.

programme.title: The A-Team
programme.desc: Four soldiers are sent on a top-secret mission in Iraq that results in them being imprisoned for a crime they did not commit. When they learn the culprit is trying to sell equipment for producing fake currency, they break out of prison to find both him and evidence of their innocence. Action adventure based on the 1980s TV series, with Liam Neeson, Bradley Cooper, Sharlto Copley and Quinton `Rampage' Jackson.

programme.title: Saving Private Ryan
programme.desc: In the aftermath of the Normandy landings, a group of American soldiers scours the battlefields of France in search of a missing infantryman, who has been given compassionate leave to return home because his brothers have been killed in the conflict. Steven Spielberg's Oscar-winning Second World War drama, starring Tom Hanks, Tom Sizemore, Edward Burns, Matt Damon, Barry Pepper and Vin Diesel.

programme.title: Alien: Covenant
programme.desc: A crew of colonists sent to populate an alien planet have their mission diverted by a mysterious signal. After landing on a nearby world, they discover what became of the ill-fated Prometheus mission. Ridley Scott's sci-fi thriller, starring Katherine Waterston, Michael Fassbender and Danny McBride.

programme.title: Universal Soldier
programme.desc: A government project succeeds in reanimating dead soldiers to form an expendable combat unit for dangerous missions. However, when two of the resurrected squad members experience flashbacks of their previous lives, they remember they had killed each other and continue the conflict where they left off. Sci-fi thriller, starring Jean-Claude Van Damme, Dolph Lundgren and Ally Walker.

programme.title: Universal Soldier: The Return
programme.desc: The resurrected warrior battles for survival against a host of supercharged troops controlled by an insane computerised opponent. Action adventure sequel, starring Jean-Claude Van Damme, Michael Jai White, Heidi Schanz and Kiana Tom.

programme.title: Air Force One
programme.desc: The American president is forced to take drastic measures to save his family when their plane is hijacked by Russian terrorists demanding the release of a jailed radical general. Meanwhile, the vice president tries to manage the crisis from Washington and has to decide whether to shoot the aircraft down. Action thriller, starring Harrison Ford, Gary Oldman, Glenn Close, Dean Stockwell and William H Macy.

programme.title: Robin Hood
programme.desc: A Saxon nobleman is declared an outlaw for protecting a poacher from a cruel Norman knight. Hiding out in a forest, he recruits a group of bandits and leads them in a campaign against the corrupt Norman aristocracy, while also fighting to save his friend's niece from being forced into marriage. Adventure, starring Patrick Bergin and Uma Thurman.

programme.title: Charlie's Angels
programme.desc: Three private investigators are recruited to rescue a computer genius from the clutches of a rival. They discover there is more at stake than they thought, as the captive genius has created a dangerous piece of software that must not fall into the wrong hands. Action adventure, based on the TV series, starring Cameron Diaz, Drew Barrymore, Lucy Liu and Bill Murray.

programme.title: Charlie's Angels: Full Throttle
programme.desc: The high-kicking trio return, this time to hunt down the villains responsible for stealing two encoded rings containing top-secret information. The case brings them into conflict with a former Angel gone bad, a spurned ex-lover out for revenge and their creepy old enemy the Thin Man. Action adventure sequel, starring Drew Barrymore, Cameron Diaz and Lucy Liu, with Demi Moore, John Cleese and Bernie Mac.

programme.title: Jarhead 3: The Siege
programme.desc: A group of US marines are called into action when heavily armed militants launch a surprise attack on an embassy in the Middle East. Action thriller, starring Scott Adkins.

programme.title: The Mummy
programme.desc: After discovering an ancient tomb in Iraq, adventurer Nick Morton is haunted by a resurrected ancient Egyptian princess who wreaks havoc on modern-day England. Could a shady British doctor be the key to unlocking the mystery? Thriller, starring Tom Cruise, Annabelle Wallis, Sofia Boutella and Russell Crowe.

programme.title: Green Zone
programme.desc: A military officer is sent to Iraq after the downfall of Saddam Hussein on a mission to find the weapons of mass destruction that were used to justify the invasion - only to be warned by a CIA agent that no such devices exist. As he continues his fruitless search, he discovers evidence of a political conspiracy. Paul Greengrass's thriller, starring Matt Damon, Greg Kinnear and Brendan Gleeson.

programme.title: Birth of the Dragon
programme.desc: An aspiring martial artist trains under a young Bruce Lee in 1960s San Francisco, and is drawn into a showdown between his mentor and renowned Shaolin master Wong Jack Man. Martial arts biopic, starring Philip Ng, Billy Magnussen and Yu Xia.

programme.title: Charlie's Angels
programme.desc: Three private investigators are recruited to rescue a computer genius from the clutches of a rival. They discover there is more at stake than they thought, as the captive genius has created a dangerous piece of software that must not fall into the wrong hands. Action adventure, based on the TV series, starring Cameron Diaz, Drew Barrymore, Lucy Liu and Bill Murray.

programme.title: Charlie's Angels: Full Throttle

The case brings them into conflict with a former Angel gone bad, a spurned ex-lover out for revenge and their creepy old enemy the Thin Man. Action adventure sequel, starring Drew Barrymore, Cameron Diaz and Lucy Liu, with Demi Moore, John Cleese and Bernie Mac.

Could a shady British doctor be the key to unlocking the mystery? Thriller, starring Tom Cruise, Annabelle Wallis, Sofia Boutella and Russell Crowe.

As he continues his fruitless search, he discovers evidence of a political conspiracy. Paul Greengrass's thriller, starring Matt Damon, Greg Kinnear and Brendan Gleeson.

programme.title: Jarhead 3: The Siege
programme.desc: A group of US marines are called into action when heavily armed militants launch a surprise attack on an embassy in the Middle East. Action thriller, starring Scott Adkins.(n)

programme.title: Birth of the Dragon
programme.desc: An aspiring martial artist trains under a young Bruce Lee in 1960s San Francisco, and is drawn into a showdown between his mentor and renowned Shaolin master Wong Jack Man. Martial arts biopic, starring Philip Ng, Billy Magnussen and Yu Xia.(n)

programme.title: The Desert Rats
programme.desc: A Scottish army officer is placed in command of a unit of Australian troops given the task of defending Tobruk against overwhelming German forces, led by the renowned general Rommel. Second World War adventure, starring Richard Burton, Robert Newton and James Mason, reprising his role as Rommel from The Desert Fox.(n)

programme.title: Armageddon
programme.desc: Nasa discovers an asteroid the size of Texas is on a collision course with Earth, so a drilling expert is recruited to train a team of misfits to transport a nuclear device into outer space to destroy it - but having had no experience of space travel, the reluctant astronauts find themselves seriously out of their depth. Sci-fi thriller, with Bruce Willis, Ben Affleck, Liv Tyler, Michael Clarke Duncan, Billy Bob Thornton and Steve Buscemi.(n)

programme.title: True Lies
programme.desc: A seemingly ordinary computer salesman leads a double life as a secret agent battling international terrorism. His naive wife is unaware of his dual employment, and goes in search of adventure - only to end up in the clutches of terrorists who have stolen a nuclear weapon. James Cameron's action comedy, starring Arnold Schwarzenegger, Jamie Lee Curtis and Tom Arnold.(n)

A scientist learns the world is soon to face a global cataclysm that will wipe out the human race, but finds the US president has plans to secretly save a fraction of the population, leaving everyone else to die. A writer learns of this scheme, and as the world is devastated by earthquakes and volcanic eruptions, he tries to get his family to the last safe refuge. Disaster movie, with John Cusack and Chiwetel Ejiofor.(n)

programme.title: The Hurricane Heist
programme.desc: Thieves attempt a major heist against the US Treasury as a Category 5 hurricane approaches one of its mint facilities. Action thriller, starring Toby Kebbell, Maggie Grace and Ryan Kwanten.(n)

programme.title: Armageddon
programme.desc: Nasa discovers an asteroid the size of Texas is on a collision course with Earth, so a drilling expert is recruited to train a team of misfits to transport a nuclear device into outer space to destroy it - but having had no experience of space travel, the reluctant astronauts find themselves seriously out of their depth. Sci-fi thriller, with Bruce Willis, Ben Affleck, Liv Tyler, Michael Clarke Duncan, Billy Bob Thornton and Steve Buscemi.(n)

A scientist learns the world is soon to face a global cataclysm that will wipe out the human race, but finds the US president has plans to secretly save a fraction of the population, leaving everyone else to die. A writer learns of this scheme, and as the world is devastated by earthquakes and volcanic eruptions, he tries to get his family to the last safe refuge. Disaster movie, with John Cusack and Chiwetel Ejiofor.(n)

programme.title: The Hurricane Heist
programme.desc: Thieves attempt a major heist against the US Treasury as a Category 5 hurricane approaches one of its mint facilities. Action thriller, starring Toby Kebbell, Maggie Grace and Ryan Kwanten.(n)

programme.title: Desperado
programme.desc: A mysterious musician carrying a guitar case full of firearms turns up in a small backwoods town to exact revenge on the drugs baron who killed his girlfriend and permanently injured his hand. Robert Rodriguez's action thriller, starring Antonio Banderas, Salma Hayek, Cheech Marin, Joaquim de Almeida, Steve Buscemi and Quentin Tarantino.(n)

programme.title: Midnight Express
programme.desc: An American student is arrested for drug smuggling while on holiday in Turkey, and thrown into a brutal prison ruled by a sadistic warder. His family and the US government plan an appeal, but he begins to realise that diplomatic efforts are fruitless, and his only hope is to plot a desperate escape. Alan Parker's fact-based drama, starring Brad Davis, John Hurt and Randy Quaid.

programme.title: High Plains Drifter
programme.desc: A mysterious stranger is hired to defend a remote frontier town from three outlaws who are making people's lives a misery. Although he rids the community of the troublemakers, the residents' lives take a turn for the worse as their saviour seizes control of the town and seeks to punish them for their past sins. Western, directed by and starring Clint Eastwood, alongside Verna Bloom and Marianna Hill.

programme.title: How to Marry a Millionaire
programme.desc: Three women rent a luxurious New York apartment as part of a scheme to get their claws into wealthy husbands - but their plans become unstuck when all three start to fall for men with good hearts and empty pockets. Comedy, starring Betty Grable, Marilyn Monroe, Lauren Bacall, William Powell, Cameron Mitchell, David Wayne, Rory Calhoun and Fred Clark.

programme.title: 20,000 Leagues Under the Sea
programme.desc: A Victorian scientist investigating the mysterious sinking of whaling ships in the Pacific falls overboard during an attack on his vessel. Along with a veteran mariner and a diver, he is picked up and taken captive by Captain Nemo and whisked away on a series of adventures in his futuristic submarine. Disney fantasy, based on Jules Verne's novel, starring Kirk Douglas, James Mason, Paul Lukas and Peter Lorre.

programme.title: The Ten Commandments
programme.desc: Egyptian prince Moses discovers his real roots are Hebrew after being banished from the land by his jealous half-brother. He returns from exile on a quest to free his people from enslavement by the new pharaoh, and warns of terrifying consequences if the ruler fails to let his people go. Cecil B DeMille's biblical epic, starring Charlton Heston, Yul Brynner, Edward G Robinson and Anne Baxter.

programme.title: The Italian Job
programme.desc: A crook assembles a motley gang to steal £4million in gold bullion from an Italian armoured car, which brings Turin to a standstill and enables the robbers to make a quick getaway in a fleet of Minis - but they end up falling foul of the Mafia along the way. Crime comedy, starring Michael Caine, Noel Coward, Benny Hill, Tony Beckley and John Le Mesurier.

programme.title: Lawrence of Arabia
programme.desc: An enigmatic British Army officer tries to unite the Arab nations against the Turks during the First World War, but comes into conflict with the military authorities when he engages the enemy with guerrilla tactics instead of more conventional methods. However, his increasingly torn loyalties leave him close to madness. Oscar-winning epic drama directed by David Lean, starring Peter O'Toole, Omar Sharif, Anthony Quinn, Alec Guinness and Jack Hawkins.

programme.title: Spartacus
programme.desc: A slave trained to fight as a gladiator turns against his masters and leads an army of rebels in a fight for freedom against the Roman state. But as the rebellion gathers momentum, two senators do all they can to exploit the uprising for their own political ends. Stanley Kubrick's Oscar-winning epic, with Kirk Douglas, Tony Curtis, Laurence Olivier, Jean Simmons, Charles Laughton and Peter Ustinov.

programme.title: The Italian Job
programme.desc: A crook assembles a motley gang to steal £4million in gold bullion from an Italian armoured car, which brings Turin to a standstill and enables the robbers to make a quick getaway in a fleet of Minis - but they end up falling foul of the Mafia along the way. Crime comedy, starring Michael Caine, Noel Coward, Benny Hill, Tony Beckley and John Le Mesurier.

programme.title: Once Upon a Time in the West
programme.desc: Jill McBain arrives in a frontier town to meet her husband, only to find he has been murdered. A railway tycoon wants the land Jill and her husband own, and has hired a ruthless hitman to kill them. But an outlaw, who was falsely accused of the crime, and a mysterious, vengeful stranger decide to protect her. Sergio Leone's Western, starring Henry Fonda, Jason Robards, Claudia Cardinale and Charles Bronson.

programme.title: The Warriors
programme.desc: A New York gang leader calls together all the gangs in the city, with the intention of uniting them. However, when he is assassinated, one of the groups he was hoping to draw into his alliance is framed for the murder, and finds all the others have turned on it. A battle for survival to make it back to their own turf alive ensues. Action adventure, starring Michael Beck and James Remar.

programme.title: Klute
programme.desc: A private detective investigates the disappearance of a scientist in New York, but finds his only lead is a prostitute with a tenuous connection to the missing man - and his attempts to gain her help are soon hampered by shadowy figures intent on silencing her. Alan J Pakula's thriller, starring Donald Sutherland, Roy Scheider and an Oscar-winning Jane Fonda.

programme.title: Wings
programme.desc: Silent epic set during the First World War, the winner of the first Best Picture Oscar, telling the story of two fighter pilots who are both in love with the same woman. Richard Arlen and Charles Rogers star as the rivals, with Clara Bow as the object of their affections.

programme.title: The King and I
programme.desc: The relationship between the powerful King of Siam and a widowed English schoolteacher, recruited to tutor his wives and many children, begins with restrained hostility - but gradually gives way to more tender feelings. Oscar-winning Rodgers and Hammerstein musical, starring Deborah Kerr, Yul Brynner, Rita Moreno, Martin Benson and Terry Saunders.

programme.title: The Graduate
programme.desc: A naive college graduate, hailed as a genius by his overbearing parents, is seduced by the middle-aged wife of his father's business partner - but later falls in love with her daughter. Oscar-winning comedy drama, starring Dustin Hoffman, Anne Bancroft and Katharine Ross, with a soundtrack by Simon and Garfunkel.

programme.title: The Bridge on the River Kwai
programme.desc: A British colonel in a Japanese PoW camp is ordered to build a railway bridge over a river, forging a vital communications link. At first he refuses to obey, but eventually agrees to take the project on - and becomes so obsessed with the task that he creates a dilemma for an American soldier sent to destroy the structure. David Lean's Oscar-winning Second World War drama, starring Alec Guinness, William Holden and Jack Hawkins.

programme.title: Cleopatra
programme.desc: The famous Queen sets out to consolidate her power after gaining control of the Egyptian kingdom. She seduces Julius Caesar and bears him a son, but the ambitious would-be tyrant is assassinated before she can take her place at his side, paving the way for her love affair with general Mark Antony - and a war for control of the Roman empire. Historical epic, starring Elizabeth Taylor, Richard Burton, Martin Landau, Rex Harrison, Hume Cronyn and George Cole.

programme.title: Some Like It Hot
programme.desc: After witnessing a mob hit in Chicago, two male jazz musicians don drag and hide out with an all-girl band to evade the gangsters pursuing them. However, the pair struggle to disguise their attraction for the beautiful lead singer - while one of them catches the eye of a smitten millionaire. Billy Wilder's classic romantic comedy, starring Jack Lemmon, Tony Curtis and Marilyn Monroe.

programme.title: The Bridge on the River Kwai
programme.desc: A British colonel in a Japanese PoW camp is ordered to build a railway bridge over a river, forging a vital communications link. At first he refuses to obey, but eventually agrees to take the project on - and becomes so obsessed with the task that he creates a dilemma for an American soldier sent to destroy the structure. David Lean's Oscar-winning Second World War drama, starring Alec Guinness, William Holden and Jack Hawkins.

programme.title: The Wild Bunch
programme.desc: Ageing outlaws, bound by a private code of honour and friendship, find themselves at odds with early 20th-century society, and come to realise their era has passed. Hired to steal guns for a tyrannical Mexican general, they instead decide to turn against him. Sam Peckinpah's Western, starring William Holden, Ernest Borgnine, Robert Ryan, Warren Oates, Strother Martin and Edmond O'Brien.

programme.title: Chinatown
programme.desc: A small-time private eye uncovers a gruesome secret when he investigates the husband of a wealthy socialite. As he is drawn deeper into the tangled web of lies and corruption, the case becomes ever more complicated. Roman Polanski's Oscar-winning mystery, starring Jack Nicholson, Faye Dunaway, John Huston and Perry Lopez.(n)

programme.title: Paint Your Wagon
programme.desc: A gold prospector buys a wife from a Mormon and agrees to share her with his mining partner when she insists they all live together. Mindful that her presence in an all-male town might give rise to jealousy, he hijacks a stagecoach carrying six working girls and opens a brothel in town. Oscar-nominated musical Western, starring Lee Marvin, Clint Eastwood, with Jean Seberg and Harve Presnell.(n)

programme.title: The Blue Max
programme.desc: A low-born German fighter pilot's determination to win the flying corps' highest award rankles with his aristocratic comrades. Meanwhile, his clandestine affair with the wife of his commanding officer risks endangering lives and destroying his own reputation. First World War drama based on Jack D Hunter's novel, starring George Peppard, Ursula Andress, James Mason and Jeremy Kemp.(n)

programme.title: A Shot in the Dark
programme.desc: The bungling Inspector Clouseau is sent to investigate a high-profile murder case. All the clues point to a maid being the guilty party, but the accident-prone detective is instantly smitten with her, and devotes his efforts to proving her innocence - despite all evidence to the contrary. Comedy, starring Peter Sellers, Elke Sommer, George Sanders and Herbert Lom.(n)

programme.title: West Side Story
programme.desc: Two teenagers from rival New York street gangs, the Jets and the Sharks, fall in love - but it causes already simmering tensions to explode. Leonard Bernstein and Stephen Sondheim's Oscar-winning musical based on Romeo and Juliet, adapted from the stage play, starring Natalie Wood, Richard Beymer, Russ Tamblyn, Rita Moreno and George Chakiris.(n)

programme.title: In Harm's Way
programme.desc: Two Navy officers are disgraced in the aftermath of the attack on Pearl Harbour, one for a disastrous engagement with the enemy and the other for a drunken brawl after learning of his wife's death. They get another chance to prove their worth when they are placed in charge of a vital counter-offensive. Second World War drama, starring John Wayne, Kirk Douglas and Henry Fonda.(n)

programme.title: To Sir, with Love
programme.desc: A black engineer takes a teaching job at a tough London school to make ends meet, and over the course of his difficult first term, struggles to gain the respect of his disruptive pupils. Drama, starring Sidney Poitier, Christian Roberts, Judy Geeson, Geoffrey Bayldon, Patricia Routledge, Christopher Chittell and Lulu.(n)

programme.title: Sunset Boulevard
programme.desc: A faded film star from the silent-movie era is fixated with making a comeback. When she meets a struggling screenwriter on the run from debt collectors, she persuades him to write a script that will mark her spectacular return to the screen. However, he takes advantage of the deluded actress, becoming her lover in a relationship where their mutual deceit ends in tragedy. Drama, with Gloria Swanson, William Holden and Eric von Stroheim.(n)

programme.title: West Side Story
programme.desc: Two teenagers from rival New York street gangs, the Jets and the Sharks, fall in love - but it causes already simmering tensions to explode. Leonard Bernstein and Stephen Sondheim's Oscar-winning musical based on Romeo and Juliet, adapted from the stage play, starring Natalie Wood, Richard Beymer, Russ Tamblyn, Rita Moreno and George Chakiris.(n)

programme.title: Alfie
programme.desc: A cockney lothario leads a charmed life, enjoying casual sex with as many women as possible with no thought of the consequences. However, a series of unexpected setbacks forces him to finally take stock of his life. Comedy drama based on the play by Bill Naughton, starring Michael Caine, Jane Asher, Millicent Martin, Shirley Anne Field, Shelley Winters and Denholm Elliott.(n)

programme.title: Return to Oz
programme.desc: Dorothy is whisked back to Oz in a storm and discovers the evil Nome King has taken over the magical land and turned her old friends to stone. Teaming up with some strange new companions, she sets out to banish him and his monstrous comrades. Fantasy adventure, based on the novels by L Frank Baum, starring Fairuza Balk, Jean Marsh, Nicol Williamson and Piper Laurie.

programme.title: Pirates of the Caribbean: On Stranger Tides
programme.desc: Captain Jack Sparrow sets sail in search of the legendary fountain of youth. His mission puts him up against a mysterious woman from his past, old enemy Barbossa, now in the employ of the British Navy, and the most feared pirate of them all, the dreaded Blackbeard. Fantasy adventure sequel, with Johnny Depp, Penelope Cruz, Geoffrey Rush and Ian McShane.

programme.title: Honey, I Shrunk the Kids
programme.desc: A professor invents a ray with the power to reduce objects in size. Unfortunately, his kids and their meddling friends activate it and are shrunk to microscopic proportions. When they are accidentally thrown out with the rubbish, the children have to contend with all kinds of animals and insects on their journey home across the backyard. Disney comedy, with Rick Moranis, Marcia Strassman and Amy O'Neill.

programme.title: Olaf's Frozen Adventure
programme.desc: Olaf the snowman is on the hunt for the perfect Christmas tradition. Animated short spun-off from Frozen, with the voices of Josh Gad, Kristen Bell and Jonathan Groff.

programme.title: Planes
programme.desc: A crop duster longs to be a racing plane, but is hamstrung by a fear of heights. With the aid of a veteran flyer, he learns to conquer his phobia and compete against some of the world's greatest flyers in a round-the-world race. Animated adventure spin-off from Pixar's Cars, with the voices of Dane Cook, Teri Hatcher and Stacy Keach.

programme.title: Toy Story
programme.desc: A jealous string-pulled cowboy doll's status as his owner's favourite plaything is threatened by the arrival of a charismatic hi-tech astronaut figure, who refuses to believe he is simply a toy. However, the rivals are forced to work together when they are left stranded in the outside world. Pixar animated adventure, featuring the voices of Tom Hanks, Tim Allen, Don Rickles and Jim Varney.

programme.title: Toy Story 2
programme.desc: Cowboy doll Woody is stolen by an unscrupulous toy collector, who knows he is worth a fortune as a collectible, prompting fearless Space Ranger Buzz Lightyear to lead a daring across-town mission to rescue him. However, Woody is tempted to spend his life languishing in the safety of a museum rather than face the prospect of his owner growing up. Animated sequel, featuring the voices of Tom Hanks, Tim Allen, Joan Cusack and Kelsey Grammer.

programme.title: Toy Story 3
programme.desc: Woody, Buzz and the other toys accidently end up in a daycare centre when their owner grows up. At first this seems like the perfect new home for them, but when they realise the dangers lurking under the surface, they begin to formulate an escape plan. Pixar animated adventure sequel, with the voices of Tom Hanks, Tim Allen, Joan Cusack, Michael Keaton and Ned Beatty.

programme.title: Moana
programme.desc: To save her island home from a terrible curse, a brave Polynesian teenager must set sail and journey into the great blue yonder. Disney animation, with the voices of Dwayne Johnson, Auli'i Cravalho, Rachel House and Temuera Morrison.

programme.title: Toy Story
programme.desc: A jealous string-pulled cowboy doll's status as his owner's favourite plaything is threatened by the arrival of a charismatic hi-tech astronaut figure, who refuses to believe he is simply a toy. However, the rivals are forced to work together when they are left stranded in the outside world. Pixar animated adventure, featuring the voices of Tom Hanks, Tim Allen, Don Rickles and Jim Varney.

At first this seems like the perfect new home for them, but when they realise the dangers lurking under the surface, they begin to formulate an escape plan. Pixar animated adventure sequel, with the voices of Tom Hanks, Tim Allen, Joan Cusack, Michael Keaton and Ned Beatty.

programme.title: Pirates of the Caribbean: Salazar's Revenge
programme.desc: Deadly ghost scavengers, led by Captain Salazar, escape from the Devil's Triangle, determined to kill every pirate at sea, including Captain Jack Sparrow. Swashbuckling sequel, starring Johnny Depp, Javier Bardem and Geoffrey Rush.

programme.title: Pete's Dragon
programme.desc: With the help of a magical dragon, a lonely orphan boy escapes from a life of servitude with the cruel Gogan family. He makes a fresh start in a seaside town, befriending a lighthouse keeper and her father, but the Gogans are soon on his trail, while a phoney doctor wants the dragon for his travelling show. Part-animated musical fantasy, starring Jim Dale, Sean Marshall, Helen Reddy, Mickey Rooney and Shelley Winters.

programme.title: The Muppet Christmas Carol
programme.desc: An embittered Victorian miser hates the festive season and people in general, but on Christmas Eve, the ghosts of his former business partners, the Marley brothers, visit him in the night. They warn him three spirits are coming to make him change his ways by showing him visions of the past, the present and what the future may hold. Comedy, with Michael Caine and Steven Mackintosh alongside the puppet characters.

programme.title: College Road Trip
programme.desc: Overprotective police chief James Porter insists on escorting his daughter Melanie on a road trip across America when she is invited for an interview at a prestigious college 800 miles from home - but the journey soon descends into chaos. Family comedy, starring Martin Lawrence, Raven-Symone and Brenda Song.

programme.title: Confessions of a Teenage Drama Queen
programme.desc: A New York teenager moves with her parents to a small town, where she quickly gets drawn into a bitter conflict with a local girl - until auditions for a musical give her the chance to outshine her rival. Meanwhile, she faces the challenge of working out how to get back to the big city for her favourite band's farewell concert. Drama, starring Lindsay Lohan, Adam Garcia, Glenne Headly and Alison Pill.

programme.title: Dinosaur
programme.desc: A group of lemurs finds a dinosaur egg, and when it hatches, brings the baby lizard up. When a meteor strike destroys their territory, the reptile and his mammal family must go in search of a new home, a quest that leads to dangerous encounters with other creatures. Animated adventure, with the voices of DB Sweeney, Julianna Margulies and Joan Plowright.

programme.title: Meet the Robinsons
programme.desc: Orphaned child genius Lewis has an unexpected encounter with a boy who claims to be from the future. With some trepidation Lewis agrees to travel forward through time to meet his new friend's madcap family. However, a bowler-hatted villain threatens his chances of ever returning home. Animated adventure, with the voices of Angela Bassett, Daniel Hansen, Jordan Fry and Tom Selleck.

programme.title: Disney's Kim Possible Movie: So the Drama
programme.desc: Feature length adventure of the animated series. The daring teenage heroine has to foil the evil Dr Drakken's fiendish plan to take over the world - but she also has to find a date for the prom. While she is delighted when the new boy at school asks her, her acceptance upsets her friend Ron, and prompts the pair to re-evaluate their feelings for each other. With the voice of Christy Carlson Romano and Will Friedle.

programme.title: The Incredibles
programme.desc: A superhero couple facing litigation from a disgruntled public have to swap fighting crime for dreary suburban normality. Bored and frustrated, the husband signs up for a mysterious assignment on a remote island - unaware he is jumping straight into a trap that will require his wife and children to wield all their powers to save him. Pixar's animated adventure, with the voices of Craig T Nelson, Holly Hunter, Jason Lee and Samuel L Jackson.

programme.title: Hercules
programme.desc: The son of Zeus, king of the Greek gods, is sent to Earth to be raised as a human. When he learns of his immortal heritage, he discovers he can only reclaim his position among the gods by becoming a true hero, so he embarks on a series of adventures and battles fearsome monsters to prove his worth. Disney animated adventure, with the voices of Tate Donovan, Danny DeVito, James Woods and Rip Torn.

programme.title: The Emperor's New Groove
programme.desc: A spoilt and uncaring emperor learns the importance of treating people fairly when a sorceress turns him into a llama so she can seize power herself. His only hope of getting his kingdom back is to seek the help of a peasant he had previously mistreated. Animated Disney comedy, featuring the voices of David Spade, John Goodman, Patrick Warburton and Eartha Kitt.

programme.title: Meet the Robinsons
programme.desc: Orphaned child genius Lewis has an unexpected encounter with a boy who claims to be from the future. With some trepidation Lewis agrees to travel forward through time to meet his new friend's madcap family. However, a bowler-hatted villain threatens his chances of ever returning home. Animated adventure, with the voices of Angela Bassett, Daniel Hansen, Jordan Fry and Tom Selleck.

programme.title: The Aristocats
programme.desc: A jealous butler is outraged when his employer leaves a vast fortune to her cat and kittens instead of to him, so he drives the pets to the French countryside and dumps them. However, a streetwise alley cat steps in to help the pampered felines find their way home and claim their rightful inheritance. Animated Disney adventure, with the voices of Eva Gabor, Phil Harris and Scatman Crothers.

programme.title: The Incredibles
programme.desc: A superhero couple facing litigation from a disgruntled public have to swap fighting crime for dreary suburban normality. Bored and frustrated, the husband signs up for a mysterious assignment on a remote island - unaware he is jumping straight into a trap that will require his wife and children to wield all their powers to save him. Pixar's animated adventure, with the voices of Craig T Nelson, Holly Hunter, Jason Lee and Samuel L Jackson.

programme.title: The Lone Ranger
programme.desc: A lawyer is left for dead after an ambush in which his Texas ranger brother is killed, but is saved by a mysterious Native American fugitive. Concealing his identity behind a mask, he and his new ally hunt down the outlaws behind the attack - only to find their actions are just part of a larger evil scheme. Western, starring Armie Hammer, Johnny Depp and Helena Bonham Carter.

programme.title: The Emperor's New Groove

Western, starring Armie Hammer, Johnny Depp and Helena Bonham Carter.(n)

programme.title: Freaky Friday
programme.desc: A mother and her rebellious teenage daughter's simultaneous wishes to trade places results in them magically switching bodies for a day and gaining an unforgettable insight into each other's lives. Disney fantasy comedy, with Jodie Foster, Barbara Harris, Patsy Kelly, John Astin, Charlene Tilton and Sorrell Booke.(n)

programme.title: Heavyweights
programme.desc: Shy, overweight kids look forward to their annual holiday together, an occasion which gives them the chance to really enjoy themselves. However, they are shocked to learn their summer camp has been taken over by a fanatical fitness trainer determined to knock them into shape by fair means or foul. Family comedy, starring Ben Stiller, Aaron Schwartz, Shaun Weiss and Tom Hodges.(n)

programme.title: Prom
programme.desc: High-school students eagerly look forward to their graduation party, but have personal and romantic issues to deal with along the way. The class president is determined everything needs to be perfect and is frustrated by a fellow student's interference - only to have a change of heart and realise he may be her perfect date. Comedy drama, with Aimee Teegarden and Thomas McDonell.(n)

programme.title: Mulan
programme.desc: A girl poses as a man so she can take her ailing father's place in the army and join in the battle against invading forces - a move that ensures her fame as a national hero. Disney animated adventure based on a Chinese folk tale, featuring the voices of Ming-Na, Eddie Murphy, BD Wong and Miguel Ferrer.(n)

programme.title: Beauty and the Beast
programme.desc: A bookish woman agrees to take her father's place as prisoner of a fearsome monster living in a castle deep in the forest. She gradually grows to see a gentler, more human side to her hideous host, and comes to realise she may be able to break the curse that turned him into a beast in the first place. Disney animated fantasy, with the voices of Paige O'Hara and Robby Benson.(n)

programme.title: Hocus Pocus
programme.desc: A teenager in Salem, Massachusetts, breaks into a spooky house on Halloween and accidentally resurrects three witches who have been dead for 300 years. The sorceresses are soon causing chaos while seeking a suitable sacrifice for a ritual to give them eternal youth. However, an old foe - a boy they turned into a cat - is on hand to help stop their mischief. Supernatural Disney comedy, with Bette Midler, Sarah Jessica Parker, Kathy Najimy and Omri Katz.(n)

programme.title: Return to Oz
programme.desc: Dorothy is whisked back to Oz in a storm and discovers the evil Nome King has taken over the magical land and turned her old friends to stone. Teaming up with some strange new companions, she sets out to banish him and his monstrous comrades. Fantasy adventure, based on the novels by L Frank Baum, starring Fairuza Balk, Jean Marsh, Nicol Williamson and Piper Laurie.(n)

programme.title: Boundin
programme.desc: Animated short film from Pixar about a sheep who loses his confidence along with his ability to dance after his wool is sheared off - but a strange creature teaches him to believe in himself.(n)

programme.title: Mulan

Disney animated adventure based on a Chinese folk tale, featuring the voices of Ming-Na, Eddie Murphy, BD Wong and Miguel Ferrer.(n)

However, an old foe - a boy they turned into a cat - is on hand to help stop their mischief. Supernatural Disney comedy, with Bette Midler, Sarah Jessica Parker, Kathy Najimy and Omri Katz.(n)

programme.title: Honey, I Shrunk the Kids
programme.desc: A professor invents a ray with the power to reduce objects in size. Unfortunately, his kids and their meddling friends activate it and are shrunk to microscopic proportions. When they are accidentally thrown out with the rubbish, the children have to contend with all kinds of animals and insects on their journey home across the backyard. Disney comedy, with Rick Moranis, Marcia Strassman and Amy O'Neill.(n)

programme.title: The Story of Robin Hood and His Merrie Men
programme.desc: A noble archer attends a royal contest, but on the way home his father is murdered by henchmen of the wicked King John. He assumes the life of an outlaw, gathering a band of followers in Sherwood Forest and fighting to bring justice to the over-taxed poor and avenge his father's death. Adventure, starring Richard Todd, Joan Rice and Peter Finch.(n)

programme.title: Zathura: A Space Adventure
programme.desc: Two squabbling brothers with time on their hands decide to play a mysterious old board game after finding it in their basement. A chance roll of the dice sends their house into deep space, where they must battle with aliens and work together to stay alive. Family sci-fi adventure, starring Josh Hutcherson, Jonah Bobo, Kristen Stewart, Tim Robbins and Dax Shepard.

programme.title: Scooby-Doo
programme.desc: The hapless hound and his chums reunite after a bitter break-up to solve a baffling mystery in the ghost-themed tourist resort of Spooky Island, whose owner is convinced he has a genuine haunting on his hands. Live-action comedy adventure based on the cartoon series, starring Sarah Michelle Gellar, Matthew Lillard, Freddie Prinze Jr, Linda Cardellini and Rowan Atkinson.

programme.title: FernGully: The Last Rainforest
programme.desc: A fairy living in a forest encounters a member of a lumber crew and magically shrinks him down to her size. He learns about the damage humans are doing to the area, and helps defend it when his fellow loggers unwittingly unleash an evil spirit that had been entombed in a tree. Animated adventure, with the voices of Robin Williams, Christian Slater and Tim Curry.

programme.title: Top Cat Begins
programme.desc: The cunning alley cat assembles a gang of feline friends to steal diamonds from a gangster. Animated comedy, with the voices of Jason Harris and Chris Edgerly.

programme.title: Kubo and the Two Strings
programme.desc: A young boy embarks on an epic quest when he inadvertently summons vengeful spirits from his past. Bafta-winning animated adventure, with the voices of Charlize Theron, Art Parkinson and Matthew McConaughey.

programme.title: The Boss Baby
programme.desc: A youngster believes his baby brother is actually a power-hungry tycoon sent to destroy his perfect family life. Animated comedy, featuring the voices of Alec Baldwin, Steve Buscemi and Jimmy Kimmel.

programme.title: Matilda
programme.desc: A gifted youngster is packed off by her selfish parents to the prison-like Crunchem Hall School. Once there, she befriends a sweet-natured teacher who convinces her that not all grown-ups are bad - and urges her to use her special powers to turn the tables on the nasty headmistress. Fantasy comedy, adapted from the children's book by Roald Dahl, with Mara Wilson, Pam Ferris, Embeth Davidtz, Rhea Perlman and Danny DeVito, who also directed.

programme.title: Gulliver's Travels
programme.desc: A directionless loser tries to prove himself to the woman he loves by volunteering for a travel writing assignment. He is sent to the Bermuda Triangle, where he ends up stranded on an island populated by miniature people to whom he is a giant. Fantasy comedy, starring Jack Black, Emily Blunt, Jason Segel and Billy Connolly.

programme.title: Annie
programme.desc: An orphan wins the fatherly affections of a tough-talking billionaire - but the no-good owner of the orphanage and her brother are out to ruin the girl's chances of happiness and make a quick profit in the process. Musical, directed by John Huston, based on the stage play. Starring Aileen Quinn, Albert Finney, Carol Burnett and Tim Curry.

programme.title: Kubo and the Two Strings
programme.desc: A young boy embarks on an epic quest when he inadvertently summons vengeful spirits from his past. Bafta-winning animated adventure, with the voices of Charlize Theron, Art Parkinson and Matthew McConaughey.

programme.title: The Boss Baby
programme.desc: A youngster believes his baby brother is actually a power-hungry tycoon sent to destroy his perfect family life. Animated comedy, featuring the voices of Alec Baldwin, Steve Buscemi and Jimmy Kimmel.

Musical, directed by John Huston, based on the stage play. Starring Aileen Quinn, Albert Finney, Carol Burnett and Tim Curry.

programme.title: Pete's Dragon
programme.desc: A young boy orphaned by a car crash and left alone in a forest befriends a giant, fire-breathing dragon. Fantasy adventure, starring Bryce Dallas Howard, Robert Redford and Oakes Fegley.

programme.title: The Secret of Moonacre
programme.desc: When her father dies, 13-year-old Maria is sent to live with her eccentric uncle in Moonacre Manor. The youngster finds herself drawn into a magical conflict when she learns she is destined to become the last Moon Princess and is charged with unearthing secrets of the past to prevent the mystical kingdom disappearing forever. Fantasy adventure set in the 19th century, starring Dakota Blue Richards, Ioan Gruffudd and Tim Curry.

programme.title: The Swan Princess: The Secret of the Castle
programme.desc: Princess Odette and Prince Derek's anniversary celebrations are thwarted by an evil sorcerer searching for a magical orb hidden deep inside their castle. When Derek is lured out of the palace to rescue his kidnapped mother, Odette calls on her band of animal friends for help. Animated fantasy sequel, with the voices of Michelle Nicastro, Douglas Sills, Jake Williamson and Christy Landers.

programme.title: The Swan Princess Christmas
programme.desc: A prince and princess prepare to celebrate their first Christmas together, and make plans for a lavish celebration for the people of their kingdom. However, when an evil wizard plots to ruin the big day, the royal couple will need the help of their animal friends to set things right. Animated fantasy sequel, with the voices of Elle Deets and Yuri Lowenthal.

programme.title: The Ant Bully
programme.desc: A friendless, moody 10-year-old spends his free time terrorising ants - until the tiny creatures take their revenge by magically reducing him to their own size and forcing him to learn how to contribute to colony life. Animated adventure, featuring the voices of Julia Roberts, Nicolas Cage, Meryl Streep and Paul Giamatti.

programme.title: Candy Planet
programme.desc: When her mother is accidentally turned into a sweet, Rainie and her friends must journey to Candy Planet and uncover an incredible secret. Animated adventure.

programme.title: Aquamarine
programme.desc: A mermaid fleeing an arranged marriage becomes stranded at a beach resort. There she meets two local girls - lifelong friends about to be separated when one of them moves to Australia - and seeks their help in winning the heart of a lifeguard she has fallen for. In return, she promises to grant them their wish to stay together. Fantasy comedy, with Sara Paxton, Emma Roberts and Joanna Levesque.

programme.title: Night at the Museum: Battle of the Smithsonian
programme.desc: The living exhibits at New York's Museum of Natural History are shipped to Washington's Smithsonian Institution - along with the artefact that brought them to life in the first place. Nightwatchman Larry tries to retrieve it, only to find the contents of the world's largest museum have been reanimated, including a pharaoh determined to take over the world. Fantasy comedy sequel, starring Ben Stiller, Amy Adams, Owen Wilson and Steve Coogan.

programme.title: Percy Jackson & the Lightning Thief
programme.desc: A teenager is shocked to discover he is the son of Greek god Poseidon and has been accused of stealing Zeus's lightning bolt. The youngster is given 14 days to find the culprit and return the missing item before the furious deity instigates an apocalyptic war. Fantasy adventure, starring Logan Lerman, Pierce Brosnan, Brandon T Jackson, Alexandra Daddario, Jake Abel, Sean Bean and Steve Coogan.

programme.title: The Ant Bully
programme.desc: A friendless, moody 10-year-old spends his free time terrorising ants - until the tiny creatures take their revenge by magically reducing him to their own size and forcing him to learn how to contribute to colony life. Animated adventure, featuring the voices of Julia Roberts, Nicolas Cage, Meryl Streep and Paul Giamatti.

programme.title: The Cat in the Hat
programme.desc: Two bored youngsters are led on a series of zany misadventures when a manic moggy comes knocking at their door with a magical stovepipe hat on his head and mischief in mind. Comedy fantasy based on the children's book by Dr Seuss, starring Mike Myers, Alec Baldwin, Dakota Fanning and Spencer Breslin.

programme.title: Night at the Museum: Battle of the Smithsonian
programme.desc: The living exhibits at New York's Museum of Natural History are shipped to Washington's Smithsonian Institution - along with the artefact that brought them to life in the first place.
